mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT DEMO_SUBJECT FROM TB_DEMO_BUSINESS WHERE IDX_DEMO_BUSINESS = TB_USER_DEMO_BS.IDX_DEMO_BUSINESS ) AS DEMO_SUBJECT ,TB_USER_DEMO_BS.* FROM TB_USER_DEMO_BS WHERE IDX_USER = #{idx_user} ORDER BY IDX_DEMO_BUSINESS DESC
SELECT * FROM TB_USER_DEMO_BS WHERE IDX_DEMO_BUSINESS = #{idx_demo_business} AND IDX_USER=#{idx_user}
mapper.insert:

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER_BS_HUMAN_RESOURCE ( IDX_USER_BS_HUMAN_RESOURCE, IDX_USER_DEMO_BS, RND_USER_ORDER, RND_USER_NAME, RND_USER_ROLE, RND_USER_CODE, RND_USER_BIRTH, RND_USER_GRAD, RND_USER_COL, RND_USER_SCHOOL, RND_USER_COL_DATE, RND_USER_COL_PART, RND_USER_6T, RND_USER_RESULT, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_BS_HUMAN_RESOURCE.NEXTVAL, #{idx_user_demo_bs}, #{rnd_user_order}, #{rnd_user_name}, #{rnd_user_role}, #{rnd_user_code}, #{rnd_user_birth}, #{rnd_user_grad}, #{rnd_user_col}, #{rnd_user_school}, #{rnd_user_col_date}, #{rnd_user_col_part}, #{rnd_user_6t}, #{rnd_user_result}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_USER_DEMO_BS SET USER_DEMOBS_STATUS = 4, LAST_UPD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE IDX_USER_DEMO_BS = #{idx_user_demo_bs}
